[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    FLOAT 00100000_00000000_00000000_00000000 is converted into TFP   001_00000000_00000000
    FLOAT 10011111_10000000_00000000_00000000 is converted into TFP   100_11111100_00000000
    TFP   001_00000000_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 00100000_00000000_00000000_00000000
    TFP   100_11111100_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 10011111_10000000_00000000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    001_00000000_00000000 + 100_11111100_00000000 = 000_11111100_00000000

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    001_00000000_00000000 * 100_11111100_00000000 = 100_00000010_00000000
